header.title: Member organisations of Make Poverty History (UK)

image.caption:
Make Poverty History banner in front of
Trades Union Congress .

bdy.p:
Make Poverty History was an anti-poverty campaign, a coalition of charities, religious groups, trade unions and campaigning groups. Members of its
British and
Irish group were:

list.entry: ALOVE - the Salvation Army for a new generation

entry.link: The Association of Guyanese Nurses and Allied Professionals UK
The Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council
British Province of Society of Jesus
Catholic Bishops' Conference of England and Wales

list.entry: Canolfan Addysg Byd - World Education Centre WNCR

entry.link: Canon Collins Educational Trust for Southern Africa

list.entry: Central America Action - UK ( CAA UK)

entry.link: Church of Scotland Board of World Mission
Who We Are - D to FDATA

system_of_measurement.link: Diana, Princess of Wales Memorial Fund

entry.link: East Midlands Network for Global Perspectives in Schools
